function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global air travel and trade leading to ease of spread of communicable diseases like COVID-19","Impact":"Global spread of diseases impacting human health and economy","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict travel restrictions, enhanced airport surveillance, and rapid response protocols","Technologies":"Biometric screening, contactless temperature scanners, rapid testing kits","People":"General public, travelers, airport and port personnel, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, public health agencies, airport and port authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate surveillance and slow response to the arrival of the index case in Nigeria","Impact":"Increase in local transmission and ineffective containment measures","Mitigation":"Improvement of airport surveillance, rapid response protocols, and data-driven decision-making","Technologies":"Biometric screening, contact tracing apps, real-time data analytics","People":"Local population, healthcare workers, government officials","Owner":"Government, public health agencies, airport authorities"},{"Description":"Slow pace of action and failure to ban travel from high-risk countries","Impact":"Imported cases contributing to local transmission and rapid spread of disease","Mitigation":"Swift travel bans, enforced quarantine for travelers from high-risk countries, and public health education","Technologies":"Real-time tracking, travel history databases, quarantine management systems","People":"General public, travelers, healthcare workers, border control authorities","Owner":"Government, public health agencies, border control authorities"}]}
